verse:
नायमात्मा प्रवचनेन लभ्यो न मेधया न बहुना श्रुतेन।
यमेवैष वृणुते तेन लभ्यस्तस्यैष आत्मा विवृणुते तनूं स्वाम्‌ ॥
meaning: Meaning:This self/soul cannot be attained through mere teachings, intelligence, or listening to scriptures. It is only attained by the one whom God chooses. To him, the self/soul reveals its true nature and pervades his entire being.
